health_data_challenges: Lack of access to healthcare, hazardous environment, discrimination, vulnerability to violence and abuse
health_service_delivery_improvement_reco: Equipped health centers near the dump site, Cost of treatment from diseases relating to the dumpsite should be scrapped off, Increase community health workers and investigations on health issues, Avail emergency and referral services near the dumpsite, Provide rabies vaccine and specialized respiratory drugs, Regulate dumping methods, Provide rescue and counseling services for girls raped at the dumpsite
health_sector_decisions: Formation of an ad hoc committee by the Environment Committee and Health Committee to address the challenges and recommendations facing Mwakirunge community
health_evidence_base: Petition and memorandum from Mwakirunge residents
